function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of green spaces during stay at home orders may result in overcrowding and difficulty maintaining social distancing.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread and potential for outbreaks in tightly packed green spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing capacity restrictions, designated visitation times, and enforcement of social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for crowd monitoring, mobile apps for park reservations, and public announcement systems for safety reminders.","People":"Residents, visitors, and park authorities.","Owner":"City planners, park management, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Underused and neglected rooftop spaces may become overcrowded as people seek open air spaces for recreation and socialization.","Impact":"Potential for contagious disease spread due to overcrowding and lack of social distancing on rooftops.","Mitigation":"Enforcing capacity limits, implementing reservation systems, and designing rooftop spaces to accommodate safe distancing.","Technologies":"Smart occupancy sensors, rooftop booking apps, and rooftop design guidelines for social distancing.","People":"Urban residents and rooftop space managers.","Owner":"City authorities, building owners, and rooftop managers."},{"Description":"Social interactions in green spaces and rooftop amenities may lead to increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Heightened potential for contagion through close social interactions in green spaces and rooftop areas.","Mitigation":"Promoting safe socializing guidelines, creating designated social areas with distance markers, and increasing public awareness of disease transmission risks.","Technologies":"Social distancing apps, public education campaigns, and contact tracing technology.","People":"Residents, social groups, and rooftop users.","Owner":"Community organizations, city authorities, and public health agencies."}]}
